root.name: Let's Cheer!
root.description: OverviewLet's Cheer! is a cheerleading/dancing game developed by Cat Daddy Games and published by 2K Games for the Xbox 360 platform.GameplayLet's Cheer! uses cheerleading routines that were choreographed by professional cheerleaders. Players dance along with the moves on-screen using the Kinect in a very similar way to Dance Central.
